separator.name: Separator
separator.description: A component that visually separates content with a horizontal or vertical line, providing visual hierarchy and improved content organization.

prop.name: orientation
prop.info_tooltips: Determines whether the separator displays as a horizontal or vertical line.

prop.name: className
prop.info_tooltips: Additional CSS class names to apply to the separator.

prop.name: customRootClass
prop.info_tooltips: Custom root class name to override default styling.

prop.name: color
prop.info_tooltips: Color theme of the separator line.

features: Support for both horizontal and vertical orientation
Helps establish visual hierarchy in layouts
Simple integration with minimal props required
